name: Toy Factory (JaooPhez)
description:
This game was created for the GDevelop Game Jam #3

You are an employee whose duty it is to sort the toys as they come down the conveyor belt. To progress through the game, you must remain alert and agile at all times. The  conveyor belt becomes faster and quicker with each stage. 

How far can you get? (I can only do it up to x7 speed)

Controls:

  • Mouse
  • Touch screen

Musics & Sounds Assets:

  • Universal UI/Menu Soundpack by Ellr (itch.io)Sweet Sounds! - A GB Studio Sound
  • Effect Pack (.VGM/.WAV) by Coffee Bat (itch.io)
  • Life is full of Joy - Yet Another Free Music Pack by Clement Panchout (itch.io) 
  • Battle Encounter - Action Music Pack 1 by ansimuz (itch.io)
  • 200 Free SFX by Kronbits (itch.io)

Link Liluo.io:

  • ToyFactory | Play on Liluo.io

Please rate the game. It will be extremely helpful to me.

Thanks for playing my game.
